snippet.title: Super Cable Boy - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304420/Super_Cable_Boy/

Follow the development on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SoerbGames
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SuperCableBoy/

You are super. You have a cable. And you are a boy.

Super Cable Boy is a retro inspired platformer, where you are put into the role of a living handheld gaming system with a power cord. Collect game cartridges to become more powerful and take on your quest to defeat "The Glitch", a mysterious entity that threatens to destroy the world.

Prepare your body for some mind-bending retroesque glichart, a weird story and a new take on platforming action!
